game.name: Clingy
game.categories: Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Stranded on a shattered moon, cling to your friends and magnets to escape through perilous landscapes. Fight gravity, chaos, and each other to reach freedom. Cling tight. Fling far. Escape together.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Stranded on a shattered moon, cling to your friends and magnets to escape through perilous landscapes. Fight gravity, chaos, and each other to reach freedom. Cling tight. Fling far. Escape together.
